body:
On Thu, Jun 23, 2011 at 3:30 PM, Guy Vaessen <guy.vaessen at gmail.com> wrote:

I found this Python package of Andreas Gerber:

Nice idea. Started one of those (scene viewer) with wxPython instead of Qt.

However, the Python module should provide more basic access to Radiance
files and programs. For example it could provide a scene file parser which
could be used in a viewer.

Regards,
Thomas
